question: Dear Doctor,My query is for my father.He is a Bronchitis patient and was admitted to a hospital 17 days back.Doctor told my family that he has lung infection on the very first day of his treatment. Now on 14th day they told us that the infection has been cured but he is now suffering from Pneumonia.We wanted to shift him to some other hospital in different location but Doctor who is looking my father told us that it could be dangerous for him.He is in ICU for entire days and yet his health keeps on fluctuating and showing no sign of improvement.Please help
title: Please help y father is struggling form last 17 days and yet he is not recovering
